description:
---------------------------------------------------------
* myWOD is not affiliated with CrossFit, Inc. in any way.
---------------------------------------------------------

myWOD HQ would like to say THANKS TO THE COACHES, TRAINERS, ATHLETES, AND CROSSFIT ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD WHO HAVE HELPED TO GIVE myWOD A HOME IN THE HEALTHCARE & FITNESS TOP 50 CATEGORY FOR OVER 3 YEARS! WE ARE EXTREMELY GRATEFUL :D


* * * What others are saying * * *
---------------------------------
Best app hands down *****

Amazing!!! Must buy!

---------------------------------
THE XF app for iPhone. *****

I've been using this app for about 7 months now and I can't imagine my workouts without it. Makes it so easy to track wods. And I LOVE using the common WOD feature. Makes it so easy to do XF on my own.

---------------------------------
Great App for getting started! *****

I'm just starting XF and cannot attend a gym due to where I work. This app is awesome for keeping me upto date on WOD and providing alternates for when I lack the equipment for today's WOD. Love this app!!

- See more by tapping "Reviews"


* * * * * * * * * * * About myWOD * * * * * * * * * * * 
If you're looking for simple way to log and track your XF workouts (WODs), myWOD is your app!  Keep track of your records, and seamlessly share your accomplishments on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Foursquare, or via Email. myWOD gives you the ability to log your max weight achievements, as well as pull daily WODs directly from www.crossfit.com, or your favorite box/gym's feed. If that isn't enough, you can also create your own custom WODs and save them for future use!

All of this with a calendar view, graph view, and a search function that makes tracking workouts a breeze along with the ability to back up your WODs and other data makes myWOD THE app for logging your XF workouts.

UNLIKE OUR COMPETITORS, WE WILL NEVER CHARGE YOU AN OUTRAGEOUS IN-APP FEE FOR ADDED CONTENT!

myWOD IS A UNIVERSAL APP, WHICH MEANS THIS VERSION WILL WORK ON BOTH YOUR IPHONE/IPOD AND IPAD, SO THERE IS NO NEED TO PAY FOR AN "HD" VERSION!

FEATURES:
◦ Share your completed WODs on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Foursquare or via Email.
◦ Search feature and calendar for easy tracking of past WODs.
◦ Add custom movements and track max weight achievements.
◦ Graphing to see your progress over time.
◦ Over 150+ preloaded common WODs, updated remotely -- so you'll always have the most up-to-date list of WODs!
◦ Create your own custom WODs for future use.
◦ Add your gyms RSS/ATOM feed and access your daily WODs directly. Add unlimited number of feeds.
◦ Standard timer, lap timer, countdown timer, interval timer, and fully programmable Tabata timer.
◦ Within timers, keep track of reps by tapping screen and then import score to completed WOD.
◦ iPod music access within timers.
◦ Imperial and Metric settings.
◦ Backup and sync data using Dropbox, Email, or Bluetooth.
◦ Large collection of how-to videos, covering many basic and advanced movements.
◦ Built-in heart rate monitor (see completed WOD screen).
◦ Weight percentage charts and calculator.
◦ Traveling? The find a gym feature locates XF gyms in your area and provides addresses, phone numbers, and websites.

---------------------------------------------------------
* myWOD is not affiliated with CrossFit, Inc. in any way.
---------------------------------------------------------
* CrossFit is a registered trademark of CrossFit, Inc.
---------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------
* * * * * * * * * * PLEASE REVIEW * * * * * * * * * *
---------------------------------------------------------
If you encounter any problems with myWOD please email us directly (supportdreamworkshop@me.com) as opposed to leaving a negative review. It is difficult for us to help you when we cannot communicate back to you. It also helps us and other users when we receive emails from you. Thank you : )
